headline: CoreSite to be Featured at PTC 2025
summary: DENVER, January 16, 2025--CoreSite, a leading hybrid IT solutions provider and subsidiary of American Tower Corporation (NYSE: AMT) ("American Tower"), will participate in the upcoming Pacific Telecommunications Conference 2025 January 19-22 at the Hilton Hawaiian Village Waikiki Beach Resort in Honolulu, Hawaii. The annual PTC event provides a strategic springboard to focus on planning, networking and discovering what lies ahead for the digital infrastructure, information and communication tech

content.title: CoreSite to be Featured at PTC 2025
content.summary: DENVER, January 16, 2025--CoreSite, a leading hybrid IT solutions provider and subsidiary of American Tower Corporation (NYSE: AMT) ("American Tower"), will participate in the upcoming Pacific Telecommunications Conference 2025 January 19-22 at the Hilton Hawaiian Village Waikiki Beach Resort in Honolulu, Hawaii. The annual PTC event provides a strategic springboard to focus on planning, networking and discovering what lies ahead for the digital infrastructure, information and communication tech
